title: so i found a site about item sets....
body:
i could really use the rioters' help right now, as i need some item sets and i need to see if this site will get my account banned/etc.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
We're working on bringing custom item sets back into the new client, but for the time being you should still be able to use those old item sets if you still have them saved. 

About 'third party' sites for item sets, I can't really speak on behalf of if they are safe or not. If our system picks up on anything malicious going on while using those, you could, in fact, be punished. Be sure to check out our FAQ on [**third party programs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)!
